text: The harshness of the mountains are a death knell for many a lost wanderer.
Many a foolhardy explorer meet a grisly fate if unprepared.
Even when off the well walked road, the well adapted can survive and thrive.
A bounty of resources await the inquisitive pathfinder.
The mighty mountains, deep valleys and vast plateaus of the world strike awe in outsiders, and pride in all who call them home.
This force is forced to fight if enemy force is in the path.
[[b]]Trailblazing[[/b]] can be increased by battles won, enemy casualities, and population.
[[b]]Trailblazing[[/b]] can be decreased by battles lost, friendly casualities, and decay.
Allows the army to ignore difficult terrain features after making preparations.
Through ranging long forgotten paths, new possibilities emerge and a nation can expand - all kept running by an idyllic, pastoral home front.
• Increases public order, movement in own regions, and boosts starting rank of units.
• Increases upkeep of buildings and armies
• Increases by battles won, more enemy casualities, and population
• Decreased by losing battles, friendly casualities, and general decay
Through ranging long forgotten paths, new possibilities emerge and a nation can expand - all kept running by an idyllic, pastoral home front.
Through ranging long forgotten paths, new possibilities emerge and a nation can expand - all kept running by an idyllic, pastoral home front.
